mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_email) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select user_nickname, user_email from users where user_nickname = #{userNickName} and user_email=#{userEmail}
